title: What happens if I don't learn new technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: I have just 6 years experience in IT industry….Please read twice to understand below lines about technology.. Technology is not an antique piece/painting i.e if you stick to one technology ,it wont increase the price of your pay.It’s my opinion that technology is like daily brushing your teeth,if you do that ,might you are aware how bad it is for next day.The above two points is only applicable based on which technology you are in now.Finally, Quora also updates on its servers or UI ,then why not you?
